name: Format\LinkButton
description: The component for opening a link in a button.

properties.name: URL
properties.description: The URL to open when a user interacts with the range of text specified in the addition.

properties.name: accessibilityLabel
properties.description: A string that is read to the user when certain accessibility functionalities are enabled.

properties.name: anchor
properties.description: An object that defines vertical alignment with another component.

properties.name: animation
properties.description:
An object that defines an animation to be applied to the component.
To remove a previously set condition, use none.

properties.name: behavior
properties.description:
An object that defines behavior for a component, like  or .
To remove a previously set condition, use none.

properties.name: conditional
properties.description: An instance or array of button properties that can be applied conditionally, and the conditions that cause them to be applied.

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: A Boolean value that determines whether the component is hidden.

properties.name: identifier
properties.description: A unique identifier for this component. If used, identifier must be unique across the entire document. An identifier is required if you want to anchor other components to this component.

properties.name: layout
properties.description:
An inline ComponentLayout object that contains layout information, or a string reference to a ComponentLayout that is defined at the top level of the document.
If layout is not defined, size and position are based on various factors, such as the device type, the length of the content, and the role of this component.

properties.name: style
properties.description:
An inline ComponentStyle object that defines the appearance of this component, or a string reference to a ComponentStyle that is defined at the top level of the document.
The none value is used for conditional design elements. Adding it here has no effect.

properties.name: text
properties.description: The text, styled according to the textStyle definition.

properties.name: textStyle
properties.description: An inline ComponentTextStyle object that contains styling information, or a string reference to a ComponentTextStyle object that is defined at the top level of the document.
